name: Grim (TylerMorgan)
description: This is my FMP game for my Game design course called Grim. In this game you play as the grim reaper where you explore the cave of limbo to collect lost souls to take them safely to the afterlife. However the devil has his own plans of sending his minions to come and take the souls directly to hell. Your goal is to take the lost souls to the afterlife while fighting off the various creatures of the devil.
